description: Kagari makes it home safely from the hospital and returns to school. Despite Yomi and Mato’s worries, Kagari quickly fits in with the rest of the class. Yomi is relieved, but also feels disappointed somehow. Then, before she knows it, Mato is with Yu, while Kagari has gained a following with their classmates. More and more, Yomi feels like she has nowhere to belong. Meanwhile, Mato notices that Yomi is acting strangely and wants to cheer her friend up, so she proposes to Kagari that they make sweets for her together, but...

titles.title: Die Welt, von der ich einst träumte, ist nun verloren
The World I Once Dreamt of Closes
いつか夢見た世界が閉じる
